text: ShaqDaqhairmAsA$nth saqpAMdyAhaqruth sRu#janti ShaDaqhair.hi mAsA$nth saqpaMSya#ntya-rddhamAqsairmAsA$nth saqpAMdyAhaqruth sRu#jantya-d^^rdhamAqsair.hi mAsA$nth saqpaMSya#ntyamAvAqsya#yAq mAsA$nth saqpAMdyAhaqruth sRu#jantyamAvAqsya#yAq hi mAsA$nth saqpaMSya#nti paurNamAqsyA mAsA$nth saqpAMdyA&haruth sRu#janti paurNamAqsyA hi mAsA$nth saqpaMSya#ntiq yO vai pUqrNa A#siq~jcatiq parAq sa si#~jcatiq yaH pUqrNAduqdaca#ti - [  ] 15
